content:
Based on the given schedules and constraints, the only 30-minute time slot between 9:00 and 17:00 on Monday where all participants (Christine, Janice, Bobby, Elizabeth, Tyler, and Edward) are available is from 11:00 to 11:30. This slot also respects Janice's preference not to meet after 13:00.

- Christine is free from 10:30 to 12:00.
- Janice is free all day, so available.
- Bobby is free until 12:00.
- Elizabeth is free from 9:30 to 11:30.
- Tyler is free from 11:00 to 12:00.
- Edward is free from 11:00 to 11:30.

The meeting from 11:00 to 11:30 fits within this free period for all, and Janice's preference is satisfied since it is before 13:00.
